Ad Feedback Indiana Rep. Mike Pence announced Thursday he won't seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012, but hinted a possible run for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, he said in a letter being sent to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.''
